text: Kiki Bertens was the defending champion, but lost in the third round to Maria Sakkari. Madison Keys won the title, defeating Caroline Wozniacki in the final, 7–6(7–5), 6–3. This was the final WTA tour final Wozniacki participated in before her retirement in January 2020. ==Seeds== The top eight seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Lucky Loser=== # Conny Perrin ===Draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ====Fifth qualifier==== ====Sixth qualifier==== ====Seventh qualifier==== ====Eighth qualifier==== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Volvo Car Open - Singles Category:Charleston Open
title: 2019 Volvo Car Open – Singles
